head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths PACKARD, MARGARET WALDO ''PAT''

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths PACKARD, MARGARET WALDO ''PAT''

block.p: PACKARD--Margaret Waldo ''Pat'', May 26, 2007. Beloved mother of Bruce Waldo Remick and the late Lee Remick, cherished grandmother of Kate Minelian, Matthew Colleran, Stacey RemickSimkins, Shelby Brambach, and great-grandmother of Remick Minelian and Georgia Minelian. Memorial service Sunday, June 3, 3:30pm at Frank E. Campbell, 1076 Madison Ave. at 81st St.

PACKARD--Margaret Waldo ''Pat'', May 26, 2007.
